      • prepareTargetFile

        public static <F> java.io.File prepareTargetFile(java.lang.String dirPath,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 F format)
                                      throws com.rapidminer.operator.UserError,
                                             java.io.IOException
        Creates a File object in some directory, given some name, and given some extention (which is possibly an enum). It specifically checks whether the directory path contains ".null" at the end which is a side-effect of RapidMiner's directory chooser.
        Parameters:
        dirPath -
        name -
        format -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.rapidminer.operator.UserError
        java.io.IOException
